name: Beach Sunset Walk
description: A romantic conversation during a beach sunset

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: The ocean looks so peaceful at sunset, doesn't it?

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_2
conversation.text: It's breathtaking. I love how the waves catch the golden light.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_1
conversation.text: Walking on the beach with you... this is perfect.

conversation.speaker: CHARACTER_2
conversation.text: Let's come back here every sunset. It can be our special place.

audioConfig.voiceInstructions: Warm, romantic tone. Speaking softly with love and contentment. Gentle pauses between thoughts, as if savoring the moment.
Soft, dreamy voice filled with happiness. Speaking with gentle emotion and occasional sighs of contentment.
